pysjobs¶

A framework for running tasks defined in a config file. You can also install the in-development version of pysjobs with easy_install pysjobs==dev.

The home page is currently the bitbucket repository.

Questions & Comments¶

Please visit: http://groups.google.com/group/pyslibs

Config File Example¶

Usage¶

Thanks¶

To the pip project <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip> for a lot of the boiler plate code to get the package up and running and for testing ideas.
